name: Railgunned !
description:
Made for the Juicy Jam #1.
Survive against an infinite amount of ennemies in this endless top-down shooter.

That would usually be an easy task, but unfortunately your railgun seems to be maflunctioning...

/// GAMEPLAY ///

Switch randomly between five different projectiles !

  • Bullet: Slow, basic, boring.
  • Big boi: Blue sphere of death. Stay inside of it for a bit of protection.
  • Shotgun: Do I really need to explain to you what this does ?
  • Bouncy: Bounces around. You MIGHT get lucky and hit something with it...
  • Laser: Goes through walls and enemies alike. Line up your shot for great results !

/// CONTROLS ///

Movement: WASD (and ZQSD for my fellow Frenchies)

Shooting: Left mouse button

Quit Game: Unplug your computer (ALT+F4 works too !)
